overview.what_is_it: TechFlow is a comprehensive e-commerce and tech support platform designed to help users discover, buy, and troubleshoot the latest gadgets.
overview.how_it_works: Simply browse our catalog, place an order, or use our AI tools to troubleshoot your existing devices.
overview.who_is_it_for: Tech enthusiasts, small businesses, and anyone looking for reliable smart gadgets.
overview.devices_supported: Our web platform works on all modern browsers (Chrome, Safari, Edge) on Desktops, Tablets, and Smartphones.
overview.mobile_app: Yes, we have a mobile app available for iOS and Android.
overview.updates: We release platform updates bi-weekly to ensure security and new features.

account_management.create_account: Click the 'Sign Up' button in the top right corner. You can register with email or Google.
account_management.reset_password: Go to the Login page and click 'Forgot Password'. A reset link will be sent to your email.
account_management.change_details: You can update your profile details in 'My Account' > 'Settings'.
account_management.delete_account: To delete your account, please contact support. This is a permanent action.
account_management.data_security: Your data is encrypted using industry-standard AES-256 encryption. We do not sell data to third parties.

pricing_and_billing.is_it_free: Creating an account is free. You only pay for the products you purchase.
pricing_and_billing.payment_methods: We accept Visa, MasterCard, PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay.
pricing_and_billing.subscriptions: We offer a 'TechFlow Premium' subscription for $9.99/mo which gives free express shipping and priority support.
pricing_and_billing.cancel_subscription: You can cancel anytime in 'My Account' > 'Billing'. Access continues until the end of the billing cycle.
pricing_and_billing.refunds: We offer full refunds within 30 days for products. Subscription fees are non-refundable after 48 hours.
pricing_and_billing.hidden_charges: No, there are no hidden fees. All taxes and shipping costs are shown at checkout.
pricing_and_billing.free_trial: Yes, TechFlow Premium comes with a 7-day free trial.

support_and_feedback.contact_support: You can contact us via this chat, email at support@techflow.com, or call +1-555-0199.
support_and_feedback.hours: Our support team is available Monday to Friday, 9 AM - 6 PM EST.
support_and_feedback.feedback: We love feedback! You can submit suggestions via the 'Feedback' tab in your dashboard.
support_and_feedback.documentation: Yes, we have a full Help Center and video tutorials available at techflow.com/help.
support_and_feedback.community: Join our community forum at community.techflow.com.
